properties.name: azure.activedirectory.keydiscoveryurl
properties.description: The URL to the JWKS download for Azure

properties.name: app.protect.authenticated
properties.description: Limit these pages to authenticated users. Use '=/route1' for a single route. Use '=/route1, /route2' for multiple.

properties.name: notifications.host
properties.description: The hostname of the server that will accept notifications. Use your ngrok proxy for local development.

properties.name: certificate.storename
properties.description: The filename of the certifcate store that contains the certificate and key used to sign and decrypt

properties.name: certificate.storepass
properties.description: The password that protects the certificate store

properties.name: certificate.alias
properties.description: The alias of the certificate in the certifcate store
